GPS True
Special Features Make answer/call, Heart rate/blood oxygen/sleep monitor, Music/camera control, AI voice control, Full touch screen
Device interface – primary Touchscreen
Colour Pink
Included Components Charger
Manufacturer MVEFOIT
Country of Origin China
Date First Available June 6, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $47.65
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:39:25 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Tips: Please download the APP and connect it before using the watch, need to link two bluetooths. Please refer to the below.

MVEFOIT Bluetooth Call Smart Watch Make and Receive Calls, Smartphone Smart Notification, AI Voice Control Smart Watch Reply to Text Messages, Make Calls, Open APP. Smart Bracelet on Your Wrist.

Monitor Daily Exercise Data: Steps, Calories, Distances, Minutes, Multiple Sport Modes, GPS Recording Exercise Route.

Heart Rate/ Blood Oxygen/ Sleep Monitor Watch, Automatically Monitor Your Health and Analyze Sleep Quality.

Size Suitable for Most People, Precise Body Design, More Comfortable to Wear, Simple and Stylish.

Smart Watch Compatible with Android 4.4 or above/iOS 8.0 or above Smartphone.

Drink Water Reminder / Sedentary Reminder.

Relax Games, Alarm Clock, Flashlight…………

More Functions Take You to Experience the Intelligent Life of Science and Technology.

Heart Rate / Blood Oxygen / Sleep Monitor

More Functions with Smart Watch

AI Voice Control

Send SMS, make calls, and open mobile APPs through AI voice to make life smarter

Smart Reminder

Smart watch preview calls, messages, facebook, instagram, TikTok, Twitter and other APP reminders

Drinking Reminder&Sedentary Reminder

Smart reminder for healthy life: Set reminders for drinking water or sedentary time, and the smart watch will remind you on time

DIY Watch Face

The watch has its own watch dial, and there are 150+ kinds of dials to choose from in the APP. You can also choose the pictures from your own smart phone album.

Music Control&Camera Control

Smart watch control phone camera to take photos, music switching/pause

Real Time Weather

After the smart watch is connected to the APP, it synchronizes the local weather conditions in real time, one of the essential tools for daily travel

„Äê1.7 Inch Large Screen Smart Watch„ÄëSmart watch for women men with 1.7 inch Super Retina HD display, 245*285 HD resolution, better color saturation, the picture quality is more delicate and clear, bring you more open visual enjoyment. In Addition, 150+ watch dials can be used, and you can define your own photo album.Be yourself better from a watch.
„Äê Health Management„ÄëFitness watch has a built-in enhanced biosensor chip that integrates optics, structure and algorithm, uses PPG photoelectric sensor principles to monitor accurately. It supports 7*24 hour heart rate monitoring to protect your health. Besides, our smart watch gold also supports blood oxygen and sleep monitoring, which will help you better understand your health on a deep level.
„ÄêYour Exclusive Sports Life„ÄëAccurately record your daily activities like number of steps, distance, calories burned. It helps you track daily activities with real-time stats on smart watch men and get good fitness effects. Supports multiple sports modes, such as swimming, running, cycling, etc. You can intuitively read your exercise data on the watch. Smart watch for iphone compatible with android 4.4 and above, iOS 8.0 and above smartphone.
„Äê20+ Convenient Functions„ÄëBluetooth calls, music playing, heart rate measurement, blood oxygen measurement, sleep monitor, breathing training, sedentary reminder, drinking water reminder, SMS text or SNS notifications (Whatsapp, Facebook, Instagram, etc.), games, theater mode, weather forecast, Camera control, alarm clock, waterproof, 8 sports modes, stopwatch, fitness tracker (steps, calories, km) etc. Make your life healthier and your work more efficient.

MVEFOIT

This is a brand that specializes in selling watches. We have a professional factory, dedicated to R&D and innovation, leading fashion

Previous page

  2. AI Voice Control Smartphone

    AI voice control make call, reply to SMS, control music, camera shutter, and other app.

Next page

4.5
Price: $47.65
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:39:25 UTC – Details)
